author: dlr
msg: Merge r21384/r21047/r19698 from trunk (r21967 from the 1.4.x-r21047
branch) into the 1.4.x branch, fixing the two problems noted in issue
1. A merge which results in a conflicted file in your WC should
2. 'svn merge --dry-run' needs to be smarter about accessing the
working copy with regard to paths which would've been deleted.
